explains: n. 切口，切痕；雕，切开；雕刻出来的标识（或装饰品）

sentences.en: The technique involves making a tiny incision in the skin.
sentences.cn: 该技术需要在皮肤上切个小口。

sentences.en: Through this incision, the abdominal cavity is distended with carbon dioxide gas.
sentences.cn: 通过此切口，二氧化碳气体把胸腔充得肿胀起来。

sentences.en: An incision is made along the floor of the bicipital groove.
sentences.cn: 沿肱骨沟的底部切开一个切口。
